overview: A young woman dedicates to a solitary pleasure surrounded by precious cushions. Larvae of flies appear in superimposition moving briskly and multiplying until they conquer the entire frame. Numerous signs, scratches and holes deliberately made on the film follow. On this images a tricolor ribbon is again superimposed, which start to burn together with the worms. "Common peopleâ€™ succumbs to the massacres of the state and to the terrorist attacks that infect Italy.
title: Italian Portrait
